title: Red Army Soldiers with Horse and Banner
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Three Red Army soldiers: one on horseback, one standing holding banner, the other standing holding rifle; around the base the inscription (in Russian) "We do not want war, but we are ready to fight."
name: Figure
